description: Variation of condition 5 (restricted use) of planning permission Ref:P/2012/0834 dated 06/06/2012 for change of use of units 1 and 2 from office space (Use Class B1) to use as a nursery (Use Class D1) to enable the units to be occupied as a nursery by an operator other than Maggie and Rose.
decision_conditions: Condition 5 of planning permission P/2012/0834 shall be varied to read:  5. Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (or any order revoking and re-enacting the Order with or without modification), Units 1 and 2 as identified on the approved plans shall only be used as a children's nursery and for no other uses within Use Class D1 of the said Order without the prior written permission of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason: To enable the Local Planning Authority to maintain control of the use of the premise in the interests of the amenities of the occupiers of neighbouring properties and local traffic and parking conditions, in accordance with policies 4.1, 4.11, 9.1 and 9.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (Adopted 2004/DCLG Direction 2007).
